Segment.name: B11
Segment.comment: To transmit identifying numbers, dates, and other basic data relating to the transaction set

Field.name: IdentificationCodeQualifier
Field.comment: Code designating the system/method of code structure used for Identification Code (67)

Field.name: IdentificationCode
Field.comment: Code identifying a party or other code

Field.name: Date
Field.comment: Date expressed as CCYYMMDD where CC represents the first two digits of the calendar year

Field.name: UnitOrBasisForMeasurementCode
Field.comment: Code specifying the units in which a value is being expressed, or manner in which a measurement has been taken

Field.name: ItemDescriptionType
Field.comment: Code indicating the format of a description

Field.name: Description
Field.comment: A free-form description to clarify the related data elements and their content

Field.name: ServiceLevelCode
Field.comment: Code indicating the level of transportation service or the billing service offered by the transportation carrier

Field.name: ReportTransmissionCode
Field.comment: Code defining timing, transmission method or format by which reports are to be sent
